python-lint-fast.command: if [[ "$FILE_PATH" =~ ^backend/app/.*\.py$ ]]; then (cd backend && uv run ruff check "$FILE_PATH" --fix) || echo '⚠ Linting completed'; fi
python-lint-fast.description: Quick Python linting on edited file only

typescript-lint-fast.command: if [[ "$FILE_PATH" =~ ^frontend/src.*\.(ts|tsx)$ ]]; then (cd frontend && npx eslint "$FILE_PATH" --fix 2>/dev/null) || echo '⚠ Linting completed'; fi
typescript-lint-fast.description: Quick TypeScript linting on edited file only

python-full-lint.command: cd backend && uv run ruff check . --fix

python-type-check.command: cd backend && uv run mypy app/ --incremental
